ValidationRule.description: Keeps MMS rep from saving Opportunity to DSA stage.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( OR ( ISPICKVAL( StageName, "Sold - Submitted"), ISPICKVAL( StageName, "Sold - Commissioned"), ISPICKVAL( StageName, "Referred Started"), ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Sold - Started") ), $RecordType.Id ="012300000000hQQ", OR ($Profile.Name ="MMS Sales",$Profile.Name ="MMS Sales - SB" ,$Profile.Name ="MMS Sales Quote",$Profile.Name = 'MMS SDR') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You have selected an invalid stage for your opportunity type!
